mutants.code:
def filter_keywords(text, keywords):
    lowercase_keywords = set((keyword.lower() for keyword in keywords))
    words = text.split()
    filtered_words = []
    for word in words:
        lowercase_word = word.lower()
        should_filter = any((keyword in lowercase_word for keyword in lowercase_keywords))
        if not should_filter:
            filtered_words.append(word)
    filtered_text = ''.join(filtered_words)
    return filtered_text

mutants.code:
def filter_keywords(text, keywords):
    lowercase_keywords = set((keyword.lower() for keyword in keywords))
    words = text.split()
    filtered_words = []
    for word in words:
        lowercase_word = word.lower()
        should_filter = any((keyword not in lowercase_word for keyword in lowercase_keywords))
        if not should_filter:
            filtered_words.append(word)
    filtered_text = ' '.join(filtered_words)
    return filtered_text
